properties.comment: 후에 정렬기능 orderby에 알맞은 정렬 기준을 제시하기 위해 2파트로 나누고 사이에 문자열을 더해줄것 prop.getProperty() + 정렬기준 + prop.getProperty()
properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNO, B.* FROM ( SELECT B.BOARD_NO , B.USER_NO , M.MEM_NAME , M.MEM_PIC , B.BOARD_TITLE , DECODE(B.BOARD_TYPE, 1, '일상', '후기') BOARD_CATEGORY , B.BOARD_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(B.CREATE_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') CREATE_DATE , B.BOARD_COUNT FROM BOARD_VIEW B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.USER_NO = M.USER_NO)
INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_NO , USER_NO , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_TYPE , BOARD_CONTENT ) VALUES ( SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? )

SELECT B.BOARD_NO , B.USER_NO , M.MEM_ID , M.MEM_NAME , M.MEM_PIC , B.BOARD_TITLE , DECODE(B.BOARD_TYPE, 1, '일상', '후기') BOARD_CATEGORY , B.BOARD_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(B.CREATE_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') CREATE_DATE , B.BOARD_COUNT FROM BOARD_VIEW B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE B.BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD_VIEW SET BOARD_COUNT = BOARD_COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD_VIEW SET BOARD_TITLE = ? , BOARD_TYPE = ? , BOARD_CONTENT = ? WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
INSERT INTO REPORT ( REP_NO , REP_WRITER_NO , REP_TARGET_NO , REP_REASON , BOARD_TYPE , REP_CONTENT_NO , REP_REPLY ) VALUES ( SEQ_REPNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
